price: 24. Waxay lumiyeen dad badan, ee (Allow) ha u kordhin daalimiinta (gar diidka ah) waxaan aheyn habow.
arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqad aḍallū kathīran walā tazidi al-ẓālimīna illā ḍalālan
